Definition at line 368 of file orbitals.cpp.

void votca::moo::orb::print_uhf_g03 ( const int &  nel_A,
const int &  nel_B,
const int &  NBasis_A,
const int  NBasis_B 
)

this function will print out an UHF guess wavefunction suitable for gaussian usage. It will print the nel_A/2-1 orbitals (doubly occupied, then the Nbasis -> NBasis+nel_B/2-1 orbitals, then the nel_A orbital, then the NBAsis_A+nel_B orbital and finally the rest
